subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Reliever Dellin Betances worked his way out of jams in the seventh and eighth innings, and Michael Pineda earned his third win in a row at Boston since he was ejected there last season.
snippet: Reliever Dellin Betances worked his way out of jams in the seventh and eighth innings, and Michael Pineda earned his third win in a row at Boston since he was ejected there last season.
